Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can include a representation of how sound travels through the string between the two students.
The student can label the parts of the string telephone (e.g., cups and string) used in the drawing.
The student can show how the device uses sound to solve the problem of communication over a distance.
The student can demonstrate that only simple materials are used to build the string telephone.
The student can illustrate the importance of communication over long distances using the device.
